" " [ 2 ] Check \'Multiple Sites\' to scan more than one site.

Show timestamp of tasks on the terminal

" Website Admin Finder is an application that helps to find the administration panel on websites in an automated way. Its purpose is to evaluate the security of websites so that better security measures can be taken.
USE:
Simply go to Application > Scan. In that section you can select two types of scanning. Single scan or multiple scan.
The single scan is used to scan a single website, while the multiple scan allows you to scan several websites at the same time.
USE OF MULTIPLE SCAN:
You need to create a .txt file containing for each line the URL of the websites to scan. For example, here is a valid example.
https://ejemplo.com https://ejemplo2.com
select the file path or type it manually in the empty field.
In the console you will see a log of the process. In case you have found an administration panel, you can go to: Application > Results, in order to view the found panels. "
Please choose a .txt file from external card with all the host to scan
"Please remove the '/' character from the end of the url"
For results go to, Application -> Results
